query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY ispell ( Template=ispell, DictFile=ispell_sample, AffFile=ispell_sample )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY ispell (template = ispell, dictfile = ispell_sample, afffile = ispell_sample)

query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell ( Template=ispell, DictFile=ispell_sample, AffFile=hunspell_sample )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell (template = ispell, dictfile = ispell_sample, afffile = hunspell_sample)

query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_long ( Template=ispell, DictFile=hunspell_sample_long, AffFile=hunspell_sample_long )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_long (template = ispell, dictfile = hunspell_sample_long, afffile = hunspell_sample_long)

query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_num ( Template=ispell, DictFile=hunspell_sample_num, AffFile=hunspell_sample_num )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_num (template = ispell, dictfile = hunspell_sample_num, afffile = hunspell_sample_num)

query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_err ( Template=ispell, DictFile=ispell_sample, AffFile=hunspell_sample_long )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_err (template = ispell, dictfile = ispell_sample, afffile = hunspell_sample_long)

query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_err ( Template=ispell, DictFile=ispell_sample, AffFile=hunspell_sample_num )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_err (template = ispell, dictfile = ispell_sample, afffile = hunspell_sample_num)

query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_invalid_1 ( Template=ispell, DictFile=hunspell_sample_long, AffFile=ispell_sample )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_invalid_1 (template = ispell, dictfile = hunspell_sample_long, afffile = ispell_sample)

query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_invalid_2 ( Template=ispell, DictFile=hunspell_sample_long, AffFile=hunspell_sample_num )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_invalid_2 (template = ispell, dictfile = hunspell_sample_long, afffile = hunspell_sample_num)

query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_invalid_3 ( Template=ispell, DictFile=hunspell_sample_num, AffFile=ispell_sample )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_invalid_3 (template = ispell, dictfile = hunspell_sample_num, afffile = ispell_sample)

query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_err ( Template=ispell, DictFile=hunspell_sample_num, AffFile=hunspell_sample_long )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY hunspell_err (template = ispell, dictfile = hunspell_sample_num, afffile = hunspell_sample_long)

query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY synonym ( Template=synonym, Synonyms=synonym_sample )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY synonym (template = synonym, synonyms = synonym_sample)

query: SELECT dictinitoption FROM pg_ts_dict WHERE dictname = 'synonym'

expected: ALTER TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY synonym (casesensitive = 1)
ALTER TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY synonym (casesensitive = 2)

query: ALTER TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY synonym (CaseSensitive = off)
expected: ALTER TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY synonym (casesensitive = off)

query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY thesaurus ( Template=thesaurus, DictFile=thesaurus_sample, Dictionary=english_stem )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY thesaurus (template = thesaurus, dictfile = thesaurus_sample, dictionary = english_stem)

query: CREATE TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION ispell_tst ( COPY=english )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION ispell_tst (copy = english)

query: ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION ispell_tst ALTER MAPPING FOR word, numword, asciiword, hword, numhword, asciihword, hword_part, hword_numpart, hword_asciipart WITH ispell, english_stem
SELECT to_tsvector('ispell_tst', 'Booking the skies after rebookings for footballklubber from a foot')
CREATE TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION hunspell_tst ( COPY=ispell_tst )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION hunspell_tst (copy = ispell_tst)

query: ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION hunspell_tst ALTER MAPPING REPLACE ispell WITH hunspell
SELECT to_tsvector('hunspell_tst', 'Booking the skies after rebookings for footballklubber from a foot')
ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION hunspell_tst ALTER MAPPING REPLACE hunspell WITH hunspell_long
ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION hunspell_tst ALTER MAPPING REPLACE hunspell_long WITH hunspell_num
CREATE TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION synonym_tst ( COPY=english )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION synonym_tst (copy = english)

query: ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION synonym_tst ALTER MAPPING FOR asciiword, hword_asciipart, asciihword WITH synonym, english_stem
SELECT to_tsvector('synonym_tst', 'Postgresql is often called as postgres or pgsql and pronounced as postgre')
SELECT to_tsvector('synonym_tst', 'Most common mistake is to write Gogle instead of Google')
SELECT to_tsvector('synonym_tst', 'Indexes or indices - Which is right plural form of index?')
CREATE TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION thesaurus_tst ( COPY=synonym_tst )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION thesaurus_tst (copy = synonym_tst)

query: ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION thesaurus_tst ALTER MAPPING FOR asciiword, hword_asciipart, asciihword WITH synonym, thesaurus, english_stem
SELECT to_tsvector('thesaurus_tst', 'one postgres one two one two three one')
SELECT to_tsvector('thesaurus_tst', 'Supernovae star is very new star and usually called supernovae (abbreviation SN)')
SELECT to_tsvector('thesaurus_tst', 'Booking tickets is looking like a booking a tickets')
CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY tsdict_case ( Template = ispell, "DictFile" = ispell_sample, "AffFile" = ispell_sample )
expected: CREATE TEXT SEARCH DICTIONARY tsdict_case (template = ispell, "DictFile" = ispell_sample, "AffFile" = ispell_sample)
CREATE TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION dummy_tst (copy = english)

query: ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION dummy_tst ALTER MAPPING FOR word, word WITH ispell
ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION dummy_tst DROP MAPPING FOR not_a_token, not_a_token
ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION dummy_tst DROP MAPPING IF EXISTS FOR not_a_token, not_a_token
ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION dummy_tst DROP MAPPING FOR word, word
ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION dummy_tst DROP MAPPING FOR word
ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION dummy_tst DROP MAPPING IF EXISTS FOR word, word
ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION dummy_tst ADD MAPPING FOR word, word WITH ispell
ALTER TEXT SEARCH CONFIGURATION dummy_tst ADD MAPPING FOR not_a_token WITH ispell
